title: The basic principles of geometrization of the quantum mechanics
abstract: The basic principles of the quantum mechanics in the K-field formalism (see author's papers) are stated in the paper. K-field formalism arises from geometric generalization of de Broglie postulate. So, the quantum theory equations (including well-known Schrodinger, Klein-Gordon and quadratic Dirac equations) are obtained as the free wave equations on a manifold metrizing force interactions of particles. In this paper, describing wave properties of particles we will restricted ourself with construction special geometric formulation of force interactions.
